original_text: And the Lord relented from the disaster that he had spoken of bringing on his people.
korean_text: 여호와께서 뜻을 돌이키사 말씀하신 화를 그 백성에게 내리지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord relented from the disaster
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서는 그 재앙에 대해 뜻을 돌이키셨다

sentences.original_text: that he had spoken of bringing on his people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 자기 백성에게 내리겠다고 말하셨던 재앙이었다.
